labels.analysis: The MCP Server is primarily focused on enabling AI-assisted image generation and modification using Midjourney's API capabilities. Its tools allow users to create, modify, and interact with images through various operations like upscaling, variations, blending, and prompt generation. The server also includes utilities for checking prompt compliance and retrieving job statuses, supporting a seamless workflow for creative projects involving visual content.
labels.reasoning: The primary label is "Content Creation" as the server's core functionality revolves around generating and modifying images, which are fundamental to creative content production. The secondary label "AI/ML Tools" is chosen because the server leverages AI models (specifically Midjourney's capabilities) to perform its core operations. No custom label is needed as the predefined categories sufficiently cover the server's functionality.

server_info_crawled.name: Midjourney MCP Server
server_info_crawled.author: @InstantMCP/midjourneyserver
server_info_crawled.overview: Enable your AI assistant to generate stunning images and perform various actions using Midjourney's capabilities. Interact seamlessly with the MCP to create, modify, and check prompts for your creative projects.

tools.name: midjourney_imagine
tools.description: Deploy Server Midjourney MCP Server @InstantMCP/midjourneyserver Try in Playground midjourney_imagine

tools.name: midjourney_action
tools.description: Perform operations like upsampling, variations, zoom out, etc. on Midjourney-generated images.

tools.name: midjourney_seed
tools.description: Get the seed value from a Midjourney-generated image, which can be used for reproducibility.

tools.name: midjourney_blend
tools.description: Upload 2-5 images and combine them into a new image based on the concept and aesthetic of each image.

tools.name: midjourney_describe
tools.description: Upload an image and generate four prompts based on the image.

tools.name: midjourney_inpaint
tools.description: Modify specific regions of an image using a mask and optional prompt.

tools.name: midjourney_fetch_job
tools.description: Fetches the result status and details of a previously submitted Midjourney job using its Job ID.

tools.name: midjourney_prompt_check
tools.description: Checks if a given text prompt is compliant with Midjourney rules before potentially using it for generation. This is a free check.

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@InstantMCP/midjourneyserver/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())
